label: Food & Industrial Microbiology
description: Relationship of microorganisms to food manufacture and preservation, to food and industrial fermentation and processing, and to food-borne illness. Same as MCB 434. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: MCB 101 or MCB 301 or equivalent.
courseSectionInformation: Same as MCB 434. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: MCB 101 or MCB 301 or equivalent.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Food Science & Human Nutrition or Food Science or Nutrition major(s) or minor(s).
